block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
Atlantic County
Northfield Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 4 p.m. Stillwater Building, 201 South Shore Road. (609) 645-5900.
Bergen County
Dumont Mayor and Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Dumont Borough Hall, 50 Washington Avenue. (201) 387-5022.
Burlington County
Pemberton Township Council. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Pemberton Municipal Building, 500 Pemberton-Browns Mills Road. (609) 894-3314.
Essex County
Bloomfield Township Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. 1 Municipal Plaza. (973) 680-4015.
Hudson County
Hoboken City Council. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hoboken City Hall, 94 Washington Street. (201) 420-2070.
Kearny Blood drive. Wednesday from 2 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. 645 Kearny Avenue. (201) 997-0600.
